statement.p: Explain how to find the dimension of W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} -1 \\ 1 \\ 2 \\ -4 \\ -4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 1 \\ 0 \\ 1 \\ 3 \\ -1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 3 \\ -1 \\ -4 \\ -4 \\ 3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -3 \\ -4 \\ -3 \\ -1 \\ 3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 12 \\ 13 \\ 11 \\ -3 \\ -16 \end{array}\right]\right\}.
